message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you that I think you'll really value. I'm offering it to you for $100.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $95 is the lowest I can go. This product is worth a lot to you, so I'm sure you'll agree it's a fair price.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $95, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $90?
Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to come down to $92.  Let's split the difference and make this deal happen.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $87?
